record.dc:title: 124GP15, 15GP15, Greenup County, Kentucky. Old Fort Village. View of Rock Piles, Ash Deposit and Pebble-lined post holes.
record.wpa:project_reservoir: Late Prehistoric Fort Ancient Sites in Kentucky
record.wpa:narrative: View showing ash pile, part of Feature 25, in left background. Pebble-lined post holes in central background, rock pile and ash pile (Feature 33), in right background. Rock pile (Feature 26), in right foreground, and rock pile (Feature 27) in left foreground.
